Если не получается сдать
Код
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <map>
#define f first
#define s second
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector <int>
#define pii pair<int , int>
#define fname "lca"
using namespace std;
const int N = int(1e6);
int n = 1, q, up[N][22], t_in[N],t_out[N],x[N],y[N],t;
vi g[N];
char s[N][10];

void dfs(int v){
    t_in[v] = ++t;
    for(int i=0;i<g[v].size();i++){
        int to = g[v][i];
        up[to][0] = v;
        dfs(to);
    }
    t_out[v] = ++t;
}

void calc(){
    for(int j=1;j<=20;j++){
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) if(up[i][j-1] != -1){
            up[i][j] = up[up[i][j-1]][j-1];
        }
    }                   
}

bool ok(int u, int v){
    return (t_in[u] <= t_in[v] && t_out[u] >= t_out[v]);
}

int lca(int v, int u){
    if(ok(v,u)) return v;
    if(ok(u,v)) return u;

    for(int i=20;i>=0;i--){
        if(up[v][i] != -1 && !ok(up[v][i],u)){
            v = up[v][i];
        }
    }
    return up[v][0];
}                           

int main () {
    freopen (fname".in","r",stdin);
    freopen (fname".out","w",stdout);
    scanf("%d\n",&q);
    for(int i=1;i<=q;i++){
        scanf("%s%d%d\n",s[i],&x[i],&y[i]);
        if(s[i][0] == 'A'){
            g[x[i]].pb(y[i]);
            n = max(y[i],n);
        }            
    }
    memset(up,-1,sizeof(up));
    dfs(1);
    calc();
    for(int i=1;i<=q;i++){
        if(s[i][0] == 'G'){
            printf("%d\n",lca(x[i],y[i]));
        }
    }
return 0;
}

acmp Рекурсия 154,365,673, 101.
